title: Combination of microRNA and suicide gene for targeting Glioblastoma: Inducing apoptosis and significantly suppressing tumor growth in vivo

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Zahra Fekrirad, Milad Gharedaghi, Fatemeh Saadatpour, Zahra Asghari Molabashi, Ameneh Rezayof, Alireza Korourian, Masoud Soleimani, Ehsan Arefian
